minions.name: Doppelg√§nger
minions.description: Special: When this minion goes to the discard pile from a base, search your deck for a minion and play it as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck

minions.name: G.E.L.F.
minions.description: Talent: Search your deck for a non-G.E.L.F. minion of power 4 or less. Shuffle this minion into your deck and play that minion here as an extra minion

minions.name: Mimic
minions.description: Ongoing: This minion's power is equal to the highest power printed on a minion card in play

minions.name: Copycat
minions.description: Choose another player's minion in play. This card has the same ability as that minion until the end of the turn

actions.name: Genetic Shift
actions.description: Either each of your minions gets +1 power until the end of the turn, or one of your minions gets +3 power until the end of the turn, your choice

actions.name: Transmogrify
actions.description: Destroy one of your minions. Search your deck for a minion with the same or lower power and play it as an extra minion. Shuffle your deck

actions.name: ... Really?
actions.description: Destroy one of your minions. Play an extra minion from your discard pile with the same or lower power

actions.name: Bacta the Future
actions.description: Destroy a minion. That minion's owner may immediately play an extra minion

actions.name: Mitosis
actions.description: Choose your minion in play. Play a copy of that card from your hand as an extra minion

actions.name: Cellular Bonding
actions.description: Play on a minion. Choose an action on a minion. Ongoing: This card has the abilities of the chosen action

actions.name: Shell Game
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed

actions.name: Splice as Nice
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +2 power
